long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ketchup is an extension built in order to enhance the experience of NSBM student lives with Learning Management Systems. This extension is linked with all the Learning Management Systems that NSBM uses. The undergradustes who use this extension get easy access to theie LMS Logins. And we intend to modify this even more, enabling notifications from the LMSs and Lecturers too.
